text: Sergio Onofre Jarpa Reyes (8 March 1921 – 19 April 2020) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Rengo. Jarpa served as a member of the cabinet during the government of Augusto Pinochet. He served as Minister of the Interior from 1983 through 1985. Before becoming minister, Jarpa was a Member of the Senate from May 1973 through September 1973 and again from 1990 through 1994. Jarpa died on 19 April 2020 at a nursing home in Las Condes, Chile of COVID-19, aged 99.Exsenador Sergio Onofre Jarpa falleció contagiado con Covid-19 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Chile Category:Chilean politicians
title: Sergio Onofre Jarpa
